fixes_applied.change: Changed node.url to node.fullUrl in renderMessages
fixes_applied.rationale: Messages panel links were broken due to using fragment-only URLs instead of full paths

fixes_applied.change: Added math content ($\N$, $\Z$, formulas) and \paperstatement hooks
fixes_applied.rationale: Paper had no actual math content to render - added formulas throughout document

unfixable_failures.reason: \paperstatement hook doesn't inject Lean code blocks from dressed artifacts
\paperfull proof_content elements render empty - no proof injection from dressed artifacts
Paper uses single-column layout - no .sbs-lean-column generated for two-column grid
Chapter source code uses term-mode proofs, not tactic-mode - no tactic blocks to toggle

notes: Iteration 1 improved pass rate from 92.9% to 96.0% by fixing two criteria. Remaining 4 failures are pipeline feature gaps (3) and content limitations (1), not fixable within convergence loop scope. Paper generation needs implementation work to support \paperstatement and \paperfull hooks with Lean code/proof injection.
